title: Vegetarian Burger Market Stall
description: Shala Chuan (look out for: 沙拉船 and many burger photos). A vegetarian burger stall in Gongguan Night Market with vegan options. Since it's a night market stall, it's very flexible (opens at ca. 4:30 pm and location can vary a bit, but you'll usually find it when you follow the market street). English menu available. Burgers and sandwiches with fresh vegetables and mock meat. English menu available. 30-50 NTD per burger. No seats available.
streetAddress: No 2, Lane 90, Section 4, Roosevelt Rd, Zhongzheng District
